name: Book of Enoch
description:
In Jewish myth and lore, the Kabbalah is the mystical compendium that explores the nature of the heavens and the Tree of Life. You are Enoch, a man summoned from the earth to climb the great tree and up the 10 Sephirot. The light of the Kabbalah shines through your hand, so ascend the tree and explore the heavens, against the darkness of the Qliphoth.

Currently, this game has one level. I am looking for skilled Blueprint/C++ programmers to help. I hope this first-level demo will be enticing enough.
